parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma1

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Synchronizes the trigger or the waypoint with an array of waypoints.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> triggerOrWaypoint [[synchronizeWaypoint]] waypoints

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> triggerOrWaypoint: [[Object]] or [[Array]]. Can be:
* [[Object]] - [[trigger]]
* [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> waypoints: [[Array]] of [[Waypoint]]s

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_myTrigger [[synchronizeWaypoint]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[_group2, 3]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[_group1, 2] [[synchronizeWaypoint]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[_group2, 3]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[synchronizedWaypoints]], [[createTrigger]], [[synchronizeTrigger]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 31, 2008 - 23:41</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Master85|Master85]]</dd>
<dd class="note">
To 'unsynchronize' a waypoint use: [[Waypoint]] [[synchronizeWaypoint]] []
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
